TopicTitle: [CRAFT FILES] - Unusable after downloading - Text Tabs all gone - Easy Fix?

Articles.Content:
Good afternoon everyone,

I was not sure if this should go here or in Support threads but was hoping I would get more exposure here than in there.

I have downloaded several awesome craft files I found in these threads, however they do not show up in my game (I did place them in the Sub Assy folder of my save game). Some of files have lost all of there tabs and are just a miss mash of information (i.e. the document is wide rather than long - if that makes any sense).

Also - it is only happening with Sub Assys and not other craft files.

Is there something I am doing when downloading or copying over to my game save file that is doing this?

Or is there a quick easy fix for this rather than manually editing the file to fix all the tabs (very time consuming)?

Any help is appreciated.

Cheers,

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-18T19:04:50Z" title="07/18/2015 07:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 18, 2015</time> by frozenwatters**
  
Added more Info

Yop ! Place craft here depend of where they come from SPH or VAB

D:\Kerbal Space Program 1.0.4\saves\NameOfYourSave\Ships\SPH

EDIT :

Sorry ! can you test this simple sub & tell me if it works ?

a stock [machine gun](https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=B4FEC25180514B47!1763&authkey=!AJhUmcgIipeAX3M&ithint=file%2Ccraft) with few parts ! in you sub-assembly folder .

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-18T19:24:13Z" title="07/18/2015 07:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 18, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**

Sorry ZLM did you mean that the craft file needs to be in the SPH folder first? (i.e. that will fix the tabs in the craft file)

Cheers,

No no , i miss read the first time ! Craft is on SPH & VAB .SubAssembly in Subassembly folder !

But i suspect some mod part into the Assembly files , that's why i share a Stock assembly ( just for test ) to know if you are the same issue .

Can be a download corruption , or a wrong file format !
